ADAPTED.Name: Adapted
ADAPTED.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 33%.

AERILATE.Name: Aerilate

FLUFFY.Name: Fluffy

FRIENDGUARD.Name: Friend Guard

FULLMETALBODY.Name: Full Metal Body
FULLMETALBODY.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps.

GALEWINGS.Name: Gale Wings

GALVANIZE.Name: Galvanize
GALVANIZE.Description: Normal-type moves become Electric-type and power up by 30%.

GLUTTONY.Name: Gluttony

GOOEY.Name: Gooey

GORILLATACTICS.Name: Gorilla Tactics

ICEBODY.Name: Ice Body

INTREPIDSWORD.Name: Intrepid Sword
INTREPIDSWORD.Description: Raises Attack when the Pokémon enters a battle.

IRONFIST.Name: Iron Fist

LEAFGUARD.Name: Leaf Guard

MEGALAUNCHER.Name: Mega Launcher

MERCILESS.Name: Merciless

MOODY.Name: Moody

MOTORDRIVE.Name: Motor Drive

MOXIE.Name: Moxie

MULTISCALE.Name: Multiscale

PUREFORCE.Name: Pure Force

RECKLESS.Name: Reckless

RIPEN.Name: Ripen

ROUGHSKIN.Name: Rough Skin

SANDRUSH.Name: Sand Rush

SAPSIPPER.Name: Sap Sipper

SHARPNESS.Name: Sharpness

SHEDSKIN.Name: Shed Skin

SIMPLE.Name: Simple

SKILLLINK.Name: Skill Link

SLOWSTART.Name: Slow Start

SLUSHRUSH.Name: Slush Rush

SNIPER.Name: Sniper

SOULHEART.Name: Soul-Heart

STALWART.Name: Stalwart

STAMINA.Name: Stamina

STURDY.Name: Sturdy

THICKFAT.Name: Thick Fat

TINTEDLENS.Name: Tinted Lens

TRIAGE.Name: Triage

UNAWARE.Name: Unaware

VICTORYSTAR.Name: Victory Star

VITALSPIRIT.Name: Vital Spirit

VOLTABSORB.Name: Volt Absorb

WANDERINGSPIRIT.Name: Wandering Spirit

ADRENALINERUSH.Name: Adrenaline Rush

AERODYNAMIC.Name: Aerodynamic

ARCHVILLAIN.Name: Archvillain

ARCTICARIETTE.Name: Arctic Ariette

AUTUMNAL.Name: Autumnal

BADINFLUENCE.Name: Bad Influence

BADLUCK.Name: Bad Luck

BADOMEN.Name: Bad Omen

BALLMIMIC.Name: Ball Mimic

BRAINSCRAMBLE.Name: Brain Scramble

BREAKINGWAVE.Name: Breaking Wave

BREAKTHROUGH.Name: Break Through

BRILLIANTFLURRY.Name: Brilliant Flurry

BRISK.Name: Brisk

BRUTEFORCE.Name: Brute Force

BULLY.Name: Bully

BUNKERDOWN.Name: Bunker Down

BURDENED.Name: Burdened
BURDENED.Description: Receives 33% less move damage, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

BURNSKILL.Name: Burn Skill

CANDYVEIL.Name: Candy Veil

CHALLENGER.Name: Challenger

CHILLEDBODY.Name: Chilled Body

CHILLOUT.Name: Chill Out

CHRONICCOLD.Name: Chronic Cold

CLOUDBURST.Name: Cloudburst

CLOVERSONG.Name: Clover Song

DARING.Description: When this Pokémon becomes statused, its Attack is raised by four steps.

DARKENEDSKIES.Name: Darkened Skies
DARKENEDSKIES.Description: Powers up Dark-type moves by 50% in sandstorm.

DARTER.Name: Darter
DARTER.Description: Takes 30% less move damage if a Tailwind is blowing.

DAUNTLESS.Name: Dauntless
DAUNTLESS.Description: Boosts Attack and Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

DAWNFALL.Name: Dawnfall
DAWNFALL.Description: On the first turn, its attacks burn the target.

DEBRISFIELD.Name: Debris Field
DEBRISFIELD.Description: Can't be statused due to its hard shell. Boosts Sp. Atk and Speed by 25% in sandstorm.

DECONTAMINATION.Name: Decontamination
DECONTAMINATION.Description: Prevents Bug- or Poison-type moves during moonglow.

DEEPSTING.Name: Deep Sting
DEEPSTING.Description: Boosts Attack by 50%, but physical moves deal 25% damage back as recoil.

DEEPTEETH.Name: Deep Teeth
DEEPTEETH.Description: Foes aren't released from its trapping moves even when the Pokémon leaves the field.

DELAYEDREACTION.Name: Delayed Reaction
DELAYEDREACTION.Description: 33% of all move damage taken is instead taken at the end of the next turn.

DESERTSCAVENGER.Name: Desert Scavenger
DESERTSCAVENGER.Description: Restores HP based on damage from sandstorm.

DESERTSPIRIT.Name: Desert Spirit
DESERTSPIRIT.Description: Immune to Ground-type moves. Takes 20% less damage in Sandstorm.

DESICCATE.Name: Desiccate
DESICCATE.Description: Prevents Water- or Grass-type moves during sandstorm.

DETERRENT.Name: Deterrent
DETERRENT.Description: Enemies which swap in take damage equal to 1/8th their HP.

DIRECTCURRENT.Name: Direct Current
DIRECTCURRENT.Description: At the end of each turn, its Sp. Atk is lowered. Then, you choose to raise its Speed or heal it for 1/5th HP.

DIREDIVERSION.Name: Dire Diversion
DIREDIVERSION.Description: It can avoid being knocked out by sacrificing its held item.

DISORIENTING.Name: Disorienting
DISORIENTING.Description: Physical attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to dizzy the attacker.

DOMINATING.Name: Dominating
DOMINATING.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Defense.

DOMINEERING.Name: Domineering
DOMINEERING.Description: Reduces move damage taken by 50% when HP is full. Can't be dizzied.

DOUBLECHECK.Name: Double Check
DOUBLECHECK.Description: Deals 50% more damage to targets who have already taken damage this turn.

DRAGONSBLOOD.Name: Dragon's Blood
DRAGONSBLOOD.Description: Reduces the damage of each hit against it by an amount equal to its level.

DRAGONSLAYER.Name: Dragon Slayer
DRAGONSLAYER.Description: Immune to Dragon-type moves. Deals double damage to Dragon-types.

DRAMATICLIGHTING.Name: Dramatic Lighting
DRAMATICLIGHTING.Description: Upon entry during eclipse, lowers foe's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each.

DREAMWEAVER.Name: Dream Weaver
DREAMWEAVER.Description: Raises Sp. Atk by two steps whenever any battler falls asleep.

DREAMYHAZE.Name: Dreamy Haze
DREAMYHAZE.Description: If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, the attacker becomes drowsy.

DREARYCLOUDS.Name: Dreary Clouds
DREARYCLOUDS.Description: Move damage that's decreased by rain is decreased twice as much.

DRIFTINGMIST.Name: Drifting Mist
DRIFTINGMIST.Description: Creates Grey Mist for three turns when entering the battlefield.

DYNAMO.Name: Dynamo
DYNAMO.Description: Whenever it uses a status move, becomes charged, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

EARSPLITTING.Name: Ear-Splitting
EARSPLITTING.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 50%.

EARTHSHAKER.Name: Earthshaker
EARTHSHAKER.Description: In sandstorm, Attack is boosted by 30%.

ECCENTRIC.Name: Eccentric
ECCENTRIC.Description: If its stats would be changed, instead they're changed half as much in the opposite direction (rounded up).

ECHO.Name: Echo
ECHO.Description: Repeats another Pokémon's sound moves immediately at 75% power.

ECTOPARTICLES.Name: Ecto-Particles
ECTOPARTICLES.Description: Restores HP based on damage from hail.

EFFLORESCENT.Name: Efflorescent
EFFLORESCENT.Description: The Pokémon and its allies are protected from flinching, Intimidate, Fascinate, and Frustrate.

EMERGENCYPOWER.Name: Emergency Power
EMERGENCYPOWER.Description: Uses Lightning Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.

EMOTIONAURA.Name: Emotion Aura
EMOTIONAURA.Description: Upon entry, creates an Emotion Room for five turns, switching Abilities every turn.

ENERGETIC.Name: Energetic
ENERGETIC.Description: Can't be numbed, poisoned, or have its Speed reduced.

ENVY.Name: Envy
ENVY.Description: The Pokémon's moves have priority against single targets with increased stats.

EPHEMERATE.Name: Ephemerate
EPHEMERATE.Description: Eclipse counts down twice as quickly.

ETERNALWINTER.Name: Eternal Winter
ETERNALWINTER.Description: Extends hail by two turns after knocking out any Pokémon.

EXCAVATOR.Name: Excavator
EXCAVATOR.Description: Dig and Undermine deal 50% more damage.

EXORCIST.Name: Exorcist
EXORCIST.Description: Takes half damage from Psychic- and Ghost-type attacks.

EXOTHERMENGINE.Name: Exotherm Engine
EXOTHERMENGINE.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% but the user is locked into the first move they use.

EXTORTER.Name: Extorter
EXTORTER.Description: At low health, eats other battlers' low-health triggered berries.

EXTRASCOOP.Name: Extra Scoop
EXTRASCOOP.Description: Upon entry, the Pokémon heals itself for 1/4th max HP. This can overheal.

EXTREMEPOWER.Name: Extreme Power
EXTREMEPOWER.Description: Increases Attack by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

EXTREMEVOLTAGE.Name: Extreme Voltage
EXTREMEVOLTAGE.Description: Increases Sp. Atk by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

EXTREMOPHILE.Name: Extremophile
EXTREMOPHILE.Description: Heals by 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in eclipse.

FAEVEIL.Name: Fae Veil
FAEVEIL.Description: Prevents itself and allies from being burned, frostbitten, or numbed.

FASCINATE.Name: Fascinate
FASCINATE.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Sp. Atk stat by two steps.

FASHIONABLE.Name: Fashionable
FASHIONABLE.Description: Can hold two different items, if one is clothing and the other is not.

FATCHANCE.Name: Fat Chance
FATCHANCE.Description: Raises all of its stats whenever it knocks out a Pokémon with a critical hit.

FATIGUED.Name: Fatigued
FATIGUED.Description: After attacking any foe, the Pokémon immediately uses Rest.

FEATHERCOAT.Name: Feather Coat
FEATHERCOAT.Description: Takes half damage from Ice- and Flying-type attacks.

FEEDBACK.Name: Feedback
FEEDBACK.Description: When attacked with a special move, inflicts 1/8th max HP damage on the attacker.

FEELTHEBURN.Name: Feel the Burn
FEELTHEBURN.Description: Boosts Attack by 75%, but the Pokémon becomes burned after attacking.

FELLOMEN.Name: Fell Omen
FELLOMEN.Description: During eclipse, gets a 30% boost to Sp. Atk.

FEROCIOUS.Name: Ferocious
FEROCIOUS.Description: Double the Pokémon's Speed if any enemy is below half health.

FIERYSPIRIT.Name: Fiery Spirit
FIERYSPIRIT.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to burn the attacker.

FIESTA.Name: Fiesta
FIESTA.Description: Heals by 1/8th HP whenever any Pokémon uses a dance or sound move.

FIGHTINGVIGOR.Name: Fighting Vigor
FIGHTINGVIGOR.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being numbed.

FILTHY.Name: Filthy
FILTHY.Description: Immune to Poison-type moves, and boosts both defensive stats when hit by one.

FINESUGAR.Name: Fine Sugar
FINESUGAR.Description: Restores 1/8 HP in sunshine, 1/4 when hit by Fire-type moves. Loses 1/8 in rain, takes 25% more from Water-type moves.

FIREFESTIVAL.Name: Fire Festival
FIREFESTIVAL.Description: At the end of every turn, each Pokémon takes 1/8th HP damage. This is treated as Fire-type.

FIREFIGHTER.Name: Firefighter
FIREFIGHTER.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

FLAMEWINGS.Name: Flame Wings
FLAMEWINGS.Description: Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to burn.

FLASHFREEZE.Name: Flash Freeze
FLASHFREEZE.Description: On the first turn, its attacks frostbite the target.

FLOURISHING.Name: Flourishing
FLOURISHING.Description: Grows at the end of each turn, slowing down but improving other stats.

FLUSTERFLOCK.Name: Fluster Flock
FLUSTERFLOCK.Description: Doubles Attack, but the Pokemon becomes dizzy after attacking.

FLUTTERTOTEM.Name: Flutter Totem
FLUTTERTOTEM.Description: Upon entry, summons a Cruel Cocoon on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

FLYBY.Name: Fly By
FLYBY.Description: Hits opponent with Gust when withdrawn from battle.

FLYTRAP.Name: Flytrap
FLYTRAP.Description: Grants immunity to Bug-type moves, and raises both attacking stats when hit by one.

FOGTOTEM.Name: Fog Totem
FOGTOTEM.Description: Upon entry, summons a Misdirecting Fog on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

FOLLOWTHROUGH.Name: Follow Through
FOLLOWTHROUGH.Description: Raises Speed by two steps after knocking out any Pokémon.

FOOLHARDY.Name: Foolhardy
FOOLHARDY.Description: Immune to Psychic-type moves, and boosts Speed when hit by one.

FORCEREVERSAL.Name: Force Reversal
FORCEREVERSAL.Description: Raises both attacking stats by two steps when hit by a not-very-effective move.

FORTIFIED.Name: Fortified
FORTIFIED.Description: Take 30% less damage from attacks on turns when it hasn't moved yet.

FORTUNE.Name: Fortune
FORTUNE.Description: Doubles the money gained from battles in which it participates.

FREERIDE.Name: Free Ride
FREERIDE.Description: Raises other allies' Speed by two steps upon entering the battle.

FREESTYLE.Name: Freestyle
FREESTYLE.Description: The Pokémon changes type to that of the move it's about to use. However, it's 20% less accurate.

FRIGIDREFLECTION.Name: Frigid Reflection
FRIGIDREFLECTION.Description: When hit with a special move, hits back instantly with that same move.

FROSTFANGED.Name: Frostfanged
FROSTFANGED.Description: Boosts Attack and Speed by 25% in hail.

FROSTPITALITY.Name: Frostpitality
FROSTPITALITY.Description: Prevents the foe from escaping during hail.

FROSTSCATTER.Name: Frost Scatter
FROSTSCATTER.Description: Summons a hailstorm for four turns when hit by an attack.

FROSTWINGS.Name: Frost Wings
FROSTWINGS.Description: Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to frostbite.

FRUSTRATE.Name: Frustrate
FRUSTRATE.Description: Upon entry, lowers the foe's Speed stat by two steps.

FUELHUNGRY.Name: Fuel Hungry
FUELHUNGRY.Description: Boosts Attack by 30%, but lowers Attack after using a physical move.

FULLBLUBBER.Name: Full Blubber
FULLBLUBBER.Description: Immune to Fire-type and Ice-type moves.

FULLMOONBLADE.Name: Full Moon Blade
FULLMOONBLADE.Description: Doubled Attack during the turn of a Full Moon.

FUMIGATE.Name: Fumigate
FUMIGATE.Description: Random added effects of wind-based moves are +50% more likely likely to occur.

GALEFORCE.Name: Gale Force
GALEFORCE.Description: Boosts the power of wind-based moves by 50%.

GARGANTUAN.Name: Gargantuan
GARGANTUAN.Description: Completely protects allies from foes' multi-target moves.

GARLANDGUARDIAN.Name: Garland Guardian
GARLANDGUARDIAN.Description: Creates a Safeguard upon entry, protecting from status conditions for 10 turns.

GAUSSAFTERSHOCK.Name: Gauss Aftershock
GAUSSAFTERSHOCK.Description: Pokémon that swap in for this have their Speed raised and their PP fully restored.

GILD.Name: Gild
GILD.Description: Turns the held item of a Pokémon it hits into gold coins for you to take.

GLASSFIRING.Name: Glass Firing
GLASSFIRING.Description: Immune to Fire-type moves and raises both defensive stats if hit by one.

GNAWING.Name: Gnawing
GNAWING.Description: Random added effects of bite attacks are +50% more likely likely to occur.

GORGING.Name: Gorging
GORGING.Description: Draining moves deal 30% more damage. Can overheal when draining.

GOURMAND.Name: Gourmand
GOURMAND.Description: Gets a random pinch berry at the end of each turn if it has no item.

GRAVITAS.Name: Gravitas
GRAVITAS.Description: Upon entry, intensifies gravity for five turns.

GRIPSTRENGTH.Name: Grip Strength
GRIPSTRENGTH.Description: Moves that bind the opponent deal 50% more damage (on the initial hit).

GRIT.Name: Grit
GRIT.Description: Boosts Sp. Def by two steps when hit by an attack.

GROTESQUEVITALS.Name: Grotesque Vitals
GROTESQUEVITALS.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being poisoned.

GYRESPINNER.Name: Gyre Spinner
GYRESPINNER.Description: Upon entry, traps each opponent in a whirlpool for two turns.

HARBINGER.Name: Harbinger
HARBINGER.Description: Summons eclipse for four turns when it enters battle.

HARDFALL.Name: Hard Fall
HARDFALL.Description: Deals 30% more move damage to Pokémon that are taller than it.

HARSH.Name: Harsh
HARSH.Description: Its attacks are critical against burned targets.

HEADACHE.Name: Headache
HEADACHE.Description: Doubles Sp. Atk, but the Pokemon becomes dizzy after attacking.

HEARTLESS.Name: Heartless
HEARTLESS.Description: Immune to Fairy-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

HEARTOFJUSTICE.Name: Heart of Justice
HEARTOFJUSTICE.Description: Immune to Dark-type moves, and boosts both attacking stats when hit by one.

HEATSAVOR.Name: Heat Savor
HEATSAVOR.Description: Heals by 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in sunshine.

HEAVENSCROWN.Name: Heaven's Crown
HEAVENSCROWN.Description: If the Pokémon witnesses a Total Eclipse, it gets to move twice that turn.

HERBALIST.Name: Herbalist
HERBALIST.Description: Can hold two different items, if both are Herbs.

HERDING.Name: Herding
HERDING.Description: Wild Pokemon are more likely to hold items and to be species you've never caught before.

HEROICFINALE.Name: Heroic Finale
HEROICFINALE.Description: Turns to Finale Form when only unfainted on team. Ability becomes Inner Focus.

HIGHRISE.Name: High-rise
HIGHRISE.Description: The Pokémon and its allies are immune to weather downsides.

HOLIDAYCHEER.Name: Holiday Cheer
HOLIDAYCHEER.Description: When entering battle, heals self and allies for 25% of their max health.

HONORABLE.Name: Honorable
HONORABLE.Description: Lowers priority of status moves used by any Pokémon.

HOOLIGAN.Name: Hooligan
HOOLIGAN.Description: Powers up recoil and sound moves by 30%.

HUBRIS.Name: Hubris
HUBRIS.Description: Raises Sp. Atk after knocking out any Pokémon.

HUGGABLE.Name: Huggable
HUGGABLE.Description: When hit by a move with 95 or more base power, hits back instantly with Nuzzle.

HYBRIDFIGHTER.Name: Hybrid Fighter
HYBRIDFIGHTER.Description: Punches, Kicks, and Bites combo together to create special effects.

HYPERSPEED.Name: Hyper Speed
HYPERSPEED.Description: Doubles Speed. Dashes to avoid hazards when entering.

ICEBLOCK.Name: Ice Block
ICEBLOCK.Description: It can avoid being knocked out by using its face. The face then melts.

ICEQUEEN.Name: Ice Queen
ICEQUEEN.Description: During hail, it restores its HP by half the damage it deals with attacks.

IGNITIONCYCLE.Name: Ignition Cycle
IGNITIONCYCLE.Description: Each turn, raises Speed by three steps and loses HP. If Speed was maxed, instead Speed and HP are reset.

ILLUMINANCE.Name: Illuminance
ILLUMINANCE.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in moonglow.

IMPERIOUS.Name: Imperious
IMPERIOUS.Description: Raises Speed by four steps when a stat is lowered by a foe.

IMPERVIOUS.Name: Impervious
IMPERVIOUS.Description: Protects from critical hits and from enemies lowering Defense or Sp. Def.

IMPETUOUS.Name: Impetuous
IMPETUOUS.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon raise its Speed by two steps but lower its Sp. Def.

IMPRESSIONABLE.Name: Impressionable
IMPRESSIONABLE.Description: Its same-type attack bonus is based on its party members rather than itself.

IMPULSIVE.Name: Impulsive
IMPULSIVE.Description: When this Pokémon becomes statused, its Sp. Atk is raised by four steps.

INDESTRUCTIBLE.Name: Indestructible
INDESTRUCTIBLE.Description: After being attacked, gains immunity to that move's type but loses other morphed immunities.

INDUSTRIALIZE.Name: Industrialize
INDUSTRIALIZE.Description: Immune to Steel-type moves and raises Speed if hit by one.

INEXORABLE.Name: Inexorable
INEXORABLE.Description: Pokémon take damage from status conditions even while switched out.

INFECTED.Name: Infected
INFECTED.Description: Also Grass in addition to its other types. When hit by a physical move, the attacker is also infected.

INNERLIGHT.Name: Inner Light
INNERLIGHT.Description: Summons sunshine for four turns when hit by an attack.

INSIGHTAURA.Name: Insight Aura
INSIGHTAURA.Description: Upon entry, creates an Insight Room for five turns, giving everyone a fifth move.

INTOXICATE.Name: Intoxicate
INTOXICATE.Description: Special moves have a 30% chance to poison targets.

INTROVERT.Name: Introvert
INTROVERT.Description: Takes 30% less damage until it uses an attack.

INVESTIGATOR.Name: Investigator
INVESTIGATOR.Description: At the beginning of each turn, gives clues about a foe's plan.

IRONHEEL.Name: Iron Heel
IRONHEEL.Description: Boosts the power of kicking moves by 30%.

IRONSTORM.Name: Iron Storm
IRONSTORM.Description: Causes sandstorm to deal double damage and increase Sp. Def of Rock types by 2.0x instead of 1.5x.

IRREFUTABLE.Name: Irrefutable
IRREFUTABLE.Description: Raises Attack by two steps after dealing not-very-effective or barely-effective damage.

JOYOUSSORROW.Name: Joyous Sorrow
JOYOUSSORROW.Description: Uses Wish after knocking out any Pokémon.

JUGGERNAUT.Name: Juggernaut
JUGGERNAUT.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves or activate after hitting the target.

KELPLINK.Name: Kelp Link
KELPLINK.Description: Physical moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.

KICKBACK.Name: Kickback
KICKBACK.Description: Rather than take recoil damage, it swaps out, and its replacement takes that damage.

KILLJOY.Name: Killjoy
KILLJOY.Description: Pokémon can't dance or use sound-based moves.

KLEPTOMANIAC.Name: Kleptomaniac
KLEPTOMANIAC.Description: Uses Snatch upon entry, stealing self-targeting status moves.

KNUCKLEDUSTER.Name: Knuckleduster
KNUCKLEDUSTER.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 50%.

LARDER.Name: Larder
LARDER.Description: At end of turn, regenerates its previously-used berry.

LATEBLOOMER.Name: Late Bloomer
LATEBLOOMER.Description: Deals 30% more damage when it's slower than the target.

LEVIATHAN.Name: Leviathan
LEVIATHAN.Description: Protected from critical hits. Can't be burned or frostbitten.

LIFELINE.Name: Lifeline
LIFELINE.Description: At the end of each turn, heals self by 1/20th and a party member by the amount the Pokémon was healed.

LIGHTTRICK.Name: Light Trick
LIGHTTRICK.Description: Doubled Speed if any enemy has a status condition.

LIMINAL.Name: Liminal
LIMINAL.Description: Deals 50% more damage to targets that switched in this turn. Takes 50% less damage if it switched in this turn.

LINEBACKER.Name: Linebacker
LINEBACKER.Description: Doubles the damage and recoil of recoil moves.

LIVEFAST.Name: Live Fast
LIVEFAST.Description: Boosts Speed by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

LIVINGARMOR.Name: Living Armor
LIVINGARMOR.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected against critical hits.

LONGODDS.Name: Long Odds
LONGODDS.Description: Multi-hit moves can hit up to twice as many times.

LONGRECEIVER.Name: Long Receiver
LONGRECEIVER.Description: Copies the Ability of the Pokémon it switches in to replace.

LOUD.Name: Loud
LOUD.Description: Boosts power of sound-based moves by 30%.

LOUDSLEEPER.Name: Loud Sleeper
LOUDSLEEPER.Description: When hit while asleep, hits back instantly with Snore.

LUNARIOT.Name: Luna Riot
LUNARIOT.Description: Summons moonglow for four turns when hit by an attack.

LURING.Name: Luring
LURING.Description: Its attacks are critical against dizzy targets.

LUXURYTASTE.Name: Luxury Taste
LUXURYTASTE.Description: At end of turn, heals 1/8th HP if holding a clothing item.

LYCANTHROPE.Name: Lycanthrope
LYCANTHROPE.Description: Transforms into Midnight Form at the Full Moon. Ability becomes No Guard.

MAESTRO.Name: Maestro
MAESTRO.Description: Doubles the speed of Sound-based moves.

MAGICSHIELD.Name: Magic Shield
MAGICSHIELD.Description: Negates enemy status moves that target the Pokémon or create hazards around it.

MAGNETTRAP.Name: Magnet Trap
MAGNETTRAP.Description: Prevents foes whose Sp. Atk is less than its from fleeing.

MALICE.Name: Malice
MALICE.Description: If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, curses the attacker.

MALICIOUSGLOW.Name: Malicious Glow
MALICIOUSGLOW.Description: When attacking during moonglow, uses the target's attacking stats instead of its own.

MARINEMENACE.Name: Marine Menace
MARINEMENACE.Description: Dive and Depth Charge deal 50% more damage.

MASSATTACK.Name: Mass Attack
MASSATTACK.Description: All Pokémon's damage is decreased proportional to their health remaining.

MASTERPLAN.Name: Master Plan
MASTERPLAN.Description: Raises each stat by two steps when a Total Eclipse happens.

MENTALBLOCK.Name: Mental Block
MENTALBLOCK.Description: The Pokemon can't be Taunted, Encored, Tormented, Heal Blocked, Disabled, Barred, Dizzied, or Flinched.

MENTALDAMAGE.Name: Mental Damage
MENTALDAMAGE.Description: Disables the opponent's most recently-used move for three turns upon hitting it.

METEORIC.Name: Meteoric
METEORIC.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in sandstorm or hail.

MIDDLEWAY.Name: Middle Way
MIDDLEWAY.Description: Boosts Attack by 50% if it used a special move last turn, or boosts Sp. Atk if physical.

MIDNIGHTOIL.Name: Midnight Oil
MIDNIGHTOIL.Description: Using a status move in moonglow extends the weather by a turn.

MIDNIGHTSUN.Name: Midnight Sun
MIDNIGHTSUN.Description: Powers up Dark-type moves by 50% in sunshine.

MISTCRAFT.Name: Mistcraft
MISTCRAFT.Description: Sets Fairy Terrain for five turns when hit by an attack.

MOONBASKING.Name: Moon Basking
MOONBASKING.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn if in moonglow.

MOONBLANKET.Name: Moon Blanket
MOONBLANKET.Description: User and allies take 25% less move damage during moonglow.

MOONGAZE.Name: Moon Gaze
MOONGAZE.Description: Summons moonglow for four turns when it enters battle.

MOONLIGHTER.Name: Moonlighter
MOONLIGHTER.Description: When hit in moonglow, steals the attacker's item, or knocks it away.

MOTHBURGLAR.Name: Moth Burglar
MOTHBURGLAR.Description: Hits opponent with Thief when withdrawn from battle.

MUPROTOCOL.Name: MU Protocol
MUPROTOCOL.Description: Immune to the type of the memory disc it holds.

MUTABLE.Name: Mutable
MUTABLE.Description: It changes type to that of the move it's about to use. This works only once each time the Pokémon enters battle.

MYSTICFIST.Name: Mystic Fist
MYSTICFIST.Description: Boosts the power of punching moves by 30%, and makes them special when that would be more effective.

MYSTICTAP.Name: Mystic Tap
MYSTICTAP.Description: Gets double healing from all sources during moonglow.

NEEDLEFUR.Name: Needle Fur
NEEDLEFUR.Description: Attackers lose 1/10th of their HP. If the Pokémon is below half health, attackers lose 1/5th instead.

NEGATIVEOUTLOOK.Name: Negative Outlook
NEGATIVEOUTLOOK.Description: Raises Electric-type allies' Sp. Def by 50%.

NERVENUMBER.Name: Nerve Number
NERVENUMBER.Description: Special moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.

NESTING.Name: Nesting
NESTING.Description: Heals 1/12th HP per turn if there's a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

NEUROTOXIN.Name: Neurotoxin
NEUROTOXIN.Description: While the Pokémon is unfainted (in battle or switched out), poisoned foes also suffer from dizzy.

NIGHTOWL.Name: Night Owl
NIGHTOWL.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in moonglow. Can't miss during moonglow.

NIGHTSTALKER.Name: Night Stalker
NIGHTSTALKER.Description: In moonglow, Attack is boosted by 50%, but the Pokémon is hurt for 1/10th HP each turn.

NIGHTVISION.Name: Night Vision
NIGHTVISION.Description: During moonglow, Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.

NOBLEBLADE.Name: Noble Blade
NOBLEBLADE.Description: Deals no damage to a target while they are using a status move.

NOHOPE.Name: No Hope
NOHOPE.Description: Prevents foes whose Attack is less than its from fleeing.

NOXIOUS.Name: Noxious
NOXIOUS.Description: Reduces each other Pokémon's HP by 1/12th at the end of each turn.

NUMBINGTOUCH.Name: Numbing Touch
NUMBINGTOUCH.Description: Physical moves have a 30% chance to numb targets.

OCULAR.Name: Ocular
OCULAR.Description: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself by 50%.

ODDITY.Name: Oddity
ODDITY.Description: Upon entry, creates an Odd Room for five turns, swapping offensive and defensive stats.

ONTHEWIND.Name: On the Wind
ONTHEWIND.Description: Sets a Tailwind for four turns upon entering the battle, increasing Speed.

OPTIMIZEDALLOY.Name: Optimized Alloy
OPTIMIZEDALLOY.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps, and its weight is doubled.

OUTRIDER.Name: Outrider
OUTRIDER.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Attack and Speed.

OVERCHARGE.Name: Overcharge
OVERCHARGE.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Sp. Atk and Speed.

OVERFLOWINGHEART.Name: Overflowing Heart
OVERFLOWINGHEART.Description: Copies the base stats of the Pokémon it switches in to replace.

OVERTHINKING.Name: Overthinking
OVERTHINKING.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30%, but lowers Sp. Atk after using a special move.

OVERWHELM.Name: Overwhelm
OVERWHELM.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in rain.

OXYGENATION.Name: Oxygenation
OXYGENATION.Description: Heals status problems each turn if in sunshine.

PARANOID.Name: Paranoid
PARANOID.Description: Doubles Sp. Def. The Pokémon takes double damage from Psychic-type moves.

PEARLSEEKER.Name: Pearl Seeker
PEARLSEEKER.Description: Upon entry during eclipse, if it has no item, finds and equips the Pearl of Fate.

PECKINGORDER.Name: Pecking Order
PECKINGORDER.Description: Immune to Flying-type moves and deals 50% more damage with them.

PERENNIALPAYLOAD.Name: Perennial Payload
PERENNIALPAYLOAD.Description: After fainting from exploding, revives after six turns.

PERFECTLUCK.Name: Perfect Luck
PERFECTLUCK.Description: Maximizes the frequency of multi-strike moves. Always deals critical hits.

PERSISTENTGROWTH.Name: Persistent Growth
PERSISTENTGROWTH.Description: At the end of each of its turns, Speed is lowered but every other stat is raised.

PESTILENT.Name: Pestilent
PESTILENT.Description: While the Pokémon is below half health, its attacks leech those hit.

PETRIFYING.Name: Petrifying
PETRIFYING.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to cause numbing.

PETTY.Name: Petty
PETTY.Description: Whenever a foe raises their stats, the Pokémon follows suit.

PHASESHIFT.Name: Phase Shift
PHASESHIFT.Description: The Pokemon's moves deal 50% more damage if they're a different type than last.

PLACIDITY.Name: Placidity
PLACIDITY.Description: Takes no damage from status ailments.

PLANARVEIL.Name: Planar Veil
PLANARVEIL.Description: Sets screens for twice as long during eclipse.

PLASMAGLOBE.Name: Plasma Globe
PLASMAGLOBE.Description: Attacks against the Pokémon deal 50% more damage, but the attacker takes 100% recoil.

PLOTARMOR.Name: Plot Armor
PLOTARMOR.Description: During eclipse, immune to status conditions and having its stats lowered by enemies.

PLURIPOTENCE.Name: Pluripotence
PLURIPOTENCE.Description: At the first chance, copies an opponent's species' legal Abilities.

POISONABSORB.Name: Poison Absorb
POISONABSORB.Description: Grants immunity to Poison-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

POISONPUNISH.Name: Poison Punish
POISONPUNISH.Description: Special attacks against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to poison the attacker.

POLARIZING.Name: Polarizing
POLARIZING.Description: Upon entry, creates a Quality Room for five turns, exaggerating type matchups.

POORCONDUCT.Name: Poor Conduct
POORCONDUCT.Description: Upon switch out, lowers the foe's Attack and Sp. Atk stat by insulting them.

POSITIVEOUTLOOK.Name: Positive Outlook
POSITIVEOUTLOOK.Description: Raises Electric-type allies' Sp. Atk by 50%.

POWERLIFTER.Name: Power Lifter
POWERLIFTER.Description: Its physical attacks go last but force the target to switch out after use.

PREDATION.Name: Predation
PREDATION.Description: Has a 30% chance to leech targets when using physical moves.

PRESSUREVALVE.Name: Pressure Valve
PRESSUREVALVE.Description: Right before the Pokémon is attacked, the attacker's stat changes are reset.

PUNISHER.Name: Punisher
PUNISHER.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to leech the attacker.

PUREENERGY.Name: Pure Energy
PUREENERGY.Description: Raises the Pokémon's Sp. Atk by 50%, including Style Values and other bonuses.

PUZZLING.Name: Puzzling
PUZZLING.Description: Upon entry, creates a Puzzle Room for five turns, swapping base Attack and Sp. Atk.

QUARRELSOME.Name: Quarrelsome
QUARRELSOME.Description: Both deals and takes double damage on its first full turn out in battle.

QUILLERINSTINCT.Name: Quiller Instinct
QUILLERINSTINCT.Description: Releases a layer of Spikes when hit by an attack.

RAINPRISM.Name: Rain Prism
RAINPRISM.Description: Powers up Fairy-type moves by 50% in rain.

RAMPROW.Name: Ram Prow
RAMPROW.Description: Ignores screens, Substitute, and Abilities that would affect its moves.

RATTLEEM.Name: Rattle 'Em
RATTLEEM.Description: Moves that can flinch are 50% more likely. Deals 50% more damage to Pokemon with flinch immunity.

RAZORSEDGE.Name: Razor's Edge
RAZORSEDGE.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%. They're twice as likely to crit.

REALIST.Name: Realist
REALIST.Description: Takes half damage from Dragon- and Fairy-type attacks.

REAPWHATYOUSOW.Name: Reap What You Sow
REAPWHATYOUSOW.Description: If the Pokémon faints from Perish Song, it is revived in a new form.

REAWAKENEDPOWER.Name: Reawakened Power
REAWAKENEDPOWER.Description: Maximizes Sp. Atk when its HP is lowered below half.

RECON.Name: Recon
RECON.Description: Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Sp. Def by two steps.

REFRESHMENTS.Name: Refreshments
REFRESHMENTS.Description: Upon entry during sunshine, heals the lowest HP ally or self by 50%.

REFUGE.Name: Refuge
REFUGE.Description: Pokémon that swap in for this have their status effects healed.

RELUCTANTBLADE.Name: Reluctant Blade
RELUCTANTBLADE.Description: When hit with a physical move, hits back instantly with Leafage.

RENDINGCLAWS.Name: Rending Claws
RENDINGCLAWS.Description: Critical hits lower all of the victim's stats.

RESONANT.Name: Resonant
RESONANT.Description: Moves that hit multiple targets deal 25% more damage instead of 25% less.

ROAST.Name: Roast
ROAST.Description: When the Pokémon eats a Berry, it raises its attacking stats by two steps each.

ROCKBODY.Name: Rock Body
ROCKBODY.Description: Heals 1/8th of its max HP each turn during sandstorm.

ROCKCLIMBER.Name: Rock Climber
ROCKCLIMBER.Description: Immune to Rock-type moves and to Stealth Rock, and raises Speed whenever one would hit it.

ROOTED.Name: Rooted
ROOTED.Description: Gets 50% more healing from all sources.

RUGGEDSCALES.Name: Rugged Scales
RUGGEDSCALES.Description: Protected from random added effects. Takes 30% less damage from moves with random added effects.

RUINOUS.Name: Ruinous
RUINOUS.Description: All Pokémon deal 40% more move damage.

RUNNINGFREE.Name: Running Free
RUNNINGFREE.Description: Can't be numbed, leeched, trapped, or have its Speed reduced by foes.

RUSTWRACK.Name: Rust & Wrack
RUSTWRACK.Description: The Pokémon is also Steel-type, but it takes 15% more damage from moves.

SANDBURST.Name: Sand Burst
SANDBURST.Description: Summons a sandstorm for four turns when hit by an attack.

SANDSMACABRE.Name: Sands Macabre
SANDSMACABRE.Description: When it attacks from underground in sandstorm, it'll transform into Reaper form.

SANDSNIPER.Name: Sand Sniper
SANDSNIPER.Description: Boosts Speed by 50% in sand. Can't miss during sandstorm.

SANDWORNAUGER.Name: Sandworn Auger
SANDWORNAUGER.Description: During sandstorm, Speed is boosted by 50% and twice as likely to crit.

SAPPER.Name: Sapper
SAPPER.Description: Upon entry, traps each opponent in a sand tomb for two turns.

SATURNALSKY.Name: Saturnal Sky
SATURNALSKY.Description: Changes the weather to Ring Eclipse, which heralds the Total Ring Eclipse. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.

SCATHINGSYZYGY.Name: Scathing Syzygy
SCATHINGSYZYGY.Description: Boosts all of the Pokémon's move damage by 25% during eclipse.

SCHADENFREUDE.Name: Schadenfreude
SCHADENFREUDE.Description: Restores 1/4th health after any foe faints.

SCOUREDSILHOUETTE.Name: Scoured Silhouette
SCOUREDSILHOUETTE.Description: Upon entry during sandstorm, lowers foe's Attack and Sp. Atk by two steps each.

SEALINGBODY.Name: Sealing Body
SEALINGBODY.Description: Moves used on the Pokémon are disabled for three turns.

SECRETIONSECRET.Name: Secretion Secret
SECRETIONSECRET.Description: When targeted by a status move, the offending Pokémon becomes poisoned.

SEEDSCATTER.Name: Seed Scatter
SEEDSCATTER.Description: Sets Grassy Terrain for five turns when hit by an attack.

SEEDSOWING.Name: Seed Sowing
SEEDSOWING.Description: Special moves have a 30% chance to leech targets.

SELECTIVESCUTES.Name: Selective Scutes
SELECTIVESCUTES.Description: Boosts one defending stat by two steps according to the foe's attacking stats.

SELFSUFFICIENT.Name: Self-Sufficient
SELFSUFFICIENT.Description: Heals 1/12th HP every turn. Protected from being burned or frostbitten.

SENTRY.Name: Sentry
SENTRY.Description: Takes 25% less damage while using a status move.

SERVEDCOLD.Name: Served Cold
SERVEDCOLD.Description: Boosts Attack by 20% in Hail, or 40% if also below half health.

SHAKYCODE.Name: Shaky Code
SHAKYCODE.Description: During eclipse, changes the Pokémon's type to the type of the move it's using.

SHELLCRACKER.Name: Shellcracker
SHELLCRACKER.Description: Its physical attacks reduce the target's Defense.

SHIELDWALL.Name: Shield Wall
SHIELDWALL.Description: Takes 50% less damage from hyper-effective attacks.

SHIFTINGFIST.Name: Shifting Fist
SHIFTINGFIST.Description: Punching moves change secondary type and their power is boosted by 30%.

SHOCKWINGS.Name: Shock Wings
SHOCKWINGS.Description: Flying-type attacks have a 40% chance to numb.

SICKENING.Name: Sickening
SICKENING.Description: Special moves against it lower the attacker's Speed and Sp. Atk.

SIGNALJAM.Name: Signal Jam
SIGNALJAM.Description: The Pokémon and other battlers don't benefit from same-type attacking bonus.

SIPHONSNIPER.Name: Siphon Sniper
SIPHONSNIPER.Description: On the first turn, its attacks leech the target.

SIRENSONG.Name: Siren Song
SIRENSONG.Description: After using a sound move, lowers one of each foe's attacking stats, whichever is higher.

SLAPSTICK.Name: Slapstick
SLAPSTICK.Description: Whenever a foe fails or misses, they take 1/8th HP damage.

SLICKSURFACE.Name: Slick Surface
SLICKSURFACE.Description: Can't be leeched, drained, or trapped.

SLINKY.Name: Slinky
SLINKY.Description: Two-turn retreat moves such as Dig skip the retreat turn.

SLIPSTREAM.Name: Slipstream
SLIPSTREAM.Description: Attack is boosted by 50% if a Tailwind is blowing.

SLUGGISH.Name: Sluggish
SLUGGISH.Description: The Pokémon is also Bug-type, but its Speed is halved.

SLUMBERINGDRAKE.Name: Slumbering Drake
SLUMBERINGDRAKE.Description: Falls asleep upon entry, but raises all of its stats by two steps.

SNOOZEFEST.Name: Snoozefest
SNOOZEFEST.Description: Whenever the Pokémon falls asleep, each other battler becomes drowsy.

SNOWSHROUD.Name: Snow Shroud
SNOWSHROUD.Description: Takes 25% less damage in a hailstorm.

SOLARCELL.Name: Solar Cell
SOLARCELL.Description: In sunshine, gets a 25% boost to Sp. Atk and Sp. Def.

SOULREAD.Name: Soul Read
SOULREAD.Description: Double damage to targets who don't share a type with their last-used move.

SOUNDBARRIER.Name: Sound Barrier
SOUNDBARRIER.Description: After using a sound move, raises both of the Pokémon's defensive stats.

SPACEINTERLOPER.Name: Space Interloper
SPACEINTERLOPER.Description: Attacks hit twice for half damage, drain 25% of damage dealt and become special.

SPARESCALES.Name: Spare Scales
SPARESCALES.Description: Raises defenses after using a Grass-, Ground-, or Steel-type move.

SPINESPLODE.Name: Spinesplode
SPINESPLODE.Description: Leaves two layers of spikes after it self-destructs.

SPINTENSITY.Name: Spintensity
SPINTENSITY.Description: Speed is raised each turn. Speed is reset when hit, but the attacker takes 1/8th HP damage for each step lost.

STABILITY.Name: Stability
STABILITY.Description: Can't be poisoned, burned, or frostbitten.

STAGGERINGSLAPS.Name: Staggering Slaps
STAGGERINGSLAPS.Description: Has a 30% chance to dizzy targets when using physical moves.

STAINLESSSTEEL.Name: Stainless Steel
STAINLESSSTEEL.Description: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stat steps. Immune to weather downsides.

STAMPEDE.Name: Stampede
STAMPEDE.Description: The user's critical hit chance raises or lowers with its Speed.

STARGUARDIAN.Name: Star Guardian
STARGUARDIAN.Description: Sets a Light Screen for 4 turns upon entering the battle.

STARSALIGN.Name: Stars Align
STARSALIGN.Description: During eclipse, can't miss and always activates its moves random added effects.

STEAMPOWER.Name: Steam Power
STEAMPOWER.Description: Takes 50% less damage from Water-type moves. Raises Speed by four steps when hit by one.

STEELABSORB.Name: Steel Absorb
STEELABSORB.Description: Immune to Steel-type moves and restores HP if hit by one.

STEELYSHELL.Name: Steely Shell
STEELYSHELL.Description: Steel-type attacks deal 50% more damage, and the Pokemon is protected from critical hits.

STEEPFLYING.Name: Steep Flying
STEEPFLYING.Description: Fly and Dive Bomb deal 50% more damage.

STICKYFINGERS.Name: Sticky Fingers
STICKYFINGERS.Description: Can hold a second item by stealing it.

STICKYMOLD.Name: Sticky Mold
STICKYMOLD.Description: If an attack lowers its HP to half or less, leeches the attacker.

STORMBRINGER.Name: Stormbringer
STORMBRINGER.Description: Summons rain for four turns when hit by an attack.

STORMTOTEM.Name: Storm Totem
STORMTOTEM.Description: Upon entry, summons a Turbulent Sky on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

STRAIGHTAHEAD.Name: Straight Ahead
STRAIGHTAHEAD.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Its attacks can't be redirected to new targets.

STRESSFUL.Name: Stressful
STRESSFUL.Description: Makes foes stressed and unable to use their items.

STRIKETWICE.Name: Strikes Twice
STRIKETWICE.Description: In rain, each of its hits is followed by an extra hit at 25% power.

STUBBORN.Name: Stubborn
STUBBORN.Description: Prevents its stats from being lowered by more than 1 step at a time.

STUPEFYING.Name: Stupefying
STUPEFYING.Description: Ignores Abilities that would affect its moves. Dizzies opponents that it hits below half health.

STYGIANNIGHT.Name: Stygian Night
STYGIANNIGHT.Description: Changes the weather to Blood Moon, which heralds the Full Blood Moon. Lingers for 3 turns after leaving.

STYLISH.Name: Stylish
STYLISH.Description: The Pokémon benefits twice as much from style points.

SUBSPACESCHISM.Name: Subspace Schism
SUBSPACESCHISM.Description: Upon entry, creates a Trick Room for five turns, inverting the effect of Speed.

SUDDENCHILL.Name: Sudden Chill
SUDDENCHILL.Description: Special moves against the Pokémon have a 30% chance to frostbite the attacker.

SUDDENTURN.Name: Sudden Turn
SUDDENTURN.Description: Uses Rapid Spin after its first attack to clear hazards, raise Speed, and deal damage.

SUMMITSPIRIT.Name: Summit Spirit
SUMMITSPIRIT.Description: Boosts Sp. Atk by 30% in hail.

SUNEATER.Name: Sun Eater
SUNEATER.Description: Summons eclipse for four turns when hit by an attack.

SURVIVALIST.Name: Survivalist
SURVIVALIST.Description: It avoids hazards and can't be knocked out with one hit.

SUSTAINABLE.Name: Sustainable
SUSTAINABLE.Description: Upon entry in sunshine, regenerates its used berry.

SWIFTSTOMPS.Name: Swift Stomps
SWIFTSTOMPS.Description: Doubles the Speed of kicking moves.

SWORDPLAY.Name: Swordplay
SWORDPLAY.Description: Boosts the power of blade moves by 30%.

TAIGATREKKER.Name: Taiga Trekker
TAIGATREKKER.Description: During hail, boosts Speed and Grass-type damage by 50%.

TANTALIZING.Name: Tantalizing
TANTALIZING.Description: Draws in attacks from enemies with below half health.

TEAMPLAYER.Name: Team Player
TEAMPLAYER.Description: Deals 25% more move damage for each ally in battle.

TENDERIZE.Name: Tenderize
TENDERIZE.Description: At the end of each round, lowers other numbed Pokémons' Defense and Sp. Def by two steps.

TERRITORIAL.Name: Territorial
TERRITORIAL.Description: Boosts damage by 20% if there is a weather. Immune to weather downsides.

TERRORIZE.Name: Terrorize
TERRORIZE.Description: Moves that can flinch are twice as likely to do so.

TESLACOILS.Name: Tesla Coils
TESLACOILS.Description: Becomes charged upon entry, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

THUNDERSTRUCK.Name: Thunderstruck
THUNDERSTRUCK.Description: Becomes charged when hit by an attack, doubling the power of its next Electric-type attack.

TIMEINTERLOPER.Name: Time Interloper
TIMEINTERLOPER.Description: Its attacks have priority, deal 25% less damage and become special.

TIMESKIP.Name: Time Skip
TIMESKIP.Description: Between each turn there's another turn where no one moves.

TOILANDTROUBLE.Name: Toil and Trouble
TOILANDTROUBLE.Description: Foes suffer 50% more stat reduction from burn, frostbite, and numb.

TOLLDANGER.Name: Toll Danger
TOLLDANGER.Description: When a Total Eclipse occurs, heals for 50% max HP and uses Heal Bell.

TOLLTHEBELLS.Name: Toll the Bells
TOLLTHEBELLS.Description: Upon entry during eclipse, heals the lowest HP ally or self by 50%.

TORPORSAP.Name: Torpor Sap
TORPORSAP.Description: Restores its HP by 25% of the damage it deals to sleeping targets.

TOUGH.Name: Tough
TOUGH.Description: Takes half damage from Fighting- and Rock-type moves.

TOXICATTITUDE.Name: Toxic Attitude
TOXICATTITUDE.Description: Powers up Poison-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

TOXINTAX.Name: Toxin Tax
TOXINTAX.Description: Heals based on the damage other battlers take from being poisoned.

TRAPPER.Name: Trapper
TRAPPER.Description: Takes 25% less damage from Pokémon that are trapped.

TRAUMATIZING.Name: Traumatizing
TRAUMATIZING.Description: Foes whose stats are lowered by the Pokémon keep those lowered stats even after switching.

TRENCHCARVER.Name: Trench Carver
TRENCHCARVER.Description: Doubles the speed of recoil moves.

ULTRAADAPTED.Name: Ultra Adapted
ULTRAADAPTED.Description: Powers up moves of the same type by 50%.

UNAFRAID.Name: Unafraid
UNAFRAID.Description: Takes half damage from Dark- and Bug-type moves.

UNASSUMING.Name: Unassuming
UNASSUMING.Description: Before using a status move against a single foe, lowers their Defense by two steps.

UNBREAKABLE.Name: Unbreakable
UNBREAKABLE.Description: Prevents half the self-damage from recoil and Self-Destruct/Explosion.

UNCANNYLUCK.Name: Uncanny Luck
UNCANNYLUCK.Description: If an attacker would activate a random added effect on the Pokémon, that effect is placed on the attacker instead.

UNCONQUERABLE.Name: Unconquerable
UNCONQUERABLE.Description: Blocks random added effects of attacks taken, and prevents critical hits.

UNFAZED.Name: Unfazed
UNFAZED.Description: Takes 20% less damage from neutrally effective attacks.

UNNERVE.Name: Unnerve
UNNERVE.Description: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries or Leftovers.

VANDAL.Name: Vandal
VANDAL.Description: Deals 30% more damage to targets that have an item. After attacking a foe, destroys their clothing items.

VARIETY.Name: Variety
VARIETY.Description: Powers up moves different than the last move by 50%.

VENGEANCE.Name: Vengeance
VENGEANCE.Description: After an attack reduces its HP to half or less, deals 1/4 of the attacker's HP back to the attacker.

VENOMDETTA.Name: Venomdetta
VENOMDETTA.Description: Immune to Poison-type moves, and raises both attacking stats if hit by one.

VENOMGORGER.Name: Venom Gorger
VENOMGORGER.Description: Whenever a foe's poison worsens, the Pokémon heals for 25% max HP.

VERDANT.Name: Verdant
VERDANT.Description: Powers up Grass-type moves of itself and its allies by 50%.

VICTORYMOLT.Name: Victory Molt
VICTORYMOLT.Description: Heals status conditions and resets stat changes after knocking out any Pokémon.

VITALRHYTHM.Name: Vital Rhythm
VITALRHYTHM.Description: At the end of each turn, itself and each ally heals for 1/16th of their HP.

WALLNINJA.Name: Wall Ninja
WALLNINJA.Description: The Pokémon's attacks are always critical if there is an active Room.

WEATHERED.Name: Weathered
WEATHERED.Description: Immune to weather downsides, and takes 20% less damage from attacks during weather.

WELLSUITED.Name: Well Suited
WELLSUITED.Description: Takes 50% less damage from not-very-effective or barely-effective attacks.

WHITEKNIGHT.Name: White Knight
WHITEKNIGHT.Description: Draws in moves from foes with base power 100 or more. Takes 15% less move damage.

WIBBLEWOBBLE.Name: Wibble Wobble
WIBBLEWOBBLE.Description: Uses Power Split upon entry or when hit by a move.

WILDTOTEM.Name: Wild Totem
WILDTOTEM.Description: Upon entry, summons a Primal Forest on the Pokémon's side for 6 turns.

WILLAURA.Name: Will Aura
WILLAURA.Description: Upon entry, creates a Willful Room for five turns, reducing all hits by 30 damage.

WINTERINSULATION.Name: Winter Insulation
WINTERINSULATION.Description: During hail, immune to Fire- and Electric-type moves.

WISEHUNTER.Name: Wise Hunter
WISEHUNTER.Description: After knocking out any Pokémon, raises its Sp. Atk and Sp. Def.

WISHMAKER.Name: Wish Maker
WISHMAKER.Description: The random added effects of its own moves, and of moves against it, always activate.

WORLDQUAKE.Name: Worldquake
WORLDQUAKE.Description: Ground-type moves deal 50% more damage in eclipse.

WRATHINSTINCT.Name: Wrath Instinct
WRATHINSTINCT.Description: Uses Dragon Dance if an attack lowers its HP to half or below.
